    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Wall](/Feats.aspx?ID=246) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 114 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a shield.

</column>

---

You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you. All spaces adjacent to you are difficult terrain for your enemies.
name: Divine Wall
